Title: 3. News Media
Write-Up Text: People can expect some exciting changes from the upcoming Federal Budget in Australia. With almost $2bn set aside for single-parent families and increased support for those on Centrelink payments these measures are expected to bring relief to many struggling households. The budget will also focus on issues such as healthcare education and social services with the government announcing funding increases for key areas. Political tensions run high with significant changes to party leadership under consideration. People are tuning into Federal Treasurer Jim Chalmer's budget speech at 7:30 PM AEST tomorrow to get all the latest news and analysis.
